comment.body:
If you ever get this up and running I'll be 100% onboard, as long as I'm living. 

I have around 80k ebooks, of various formats. Most are non-fiction, but some are classics.

I don't really go in for fiction, except some popular sci-fi.

I also have plenty of storage space and bandwidth, and I leave my server up about 99.99% of the time.
